about_the_game:
WELCOME TO TRINITY OF THE FABLED!


We are a small indie team that love dark fantasy and souls-like games. We hope that it shows in our work! We're very early in development so we encourage everyone to join our and hang out with us.

A NEW DARK FANTASY ACTION RPG


The corrupted worlds of the Abyss call to you, laden with the plague of chaos.

Become a Fabled warrior, god, or demon. 3 races vying for power in the realms of the Abyss-a form of chaotic energy with the power to connect interdimensional worlds. Explore the inner mysteries of these worlds to uncover hidden secrets, fight dangerous foes, and collect invaluable treasures.

A new experience with each season

The Abyss will constantly open portals into new worlds, each with their own unique characters, lore, and dangerous local inhabitants. Each season will have powerful items that can only be earned within a finite amount of time.

Deeply satisfying combat

Following the tradition of the souls-like genre, enemies in Trinity Of The Fabled are extremely difficult. Mistakes will be heavily punished. In order to become the fabled, you must learn your enemies' weaknesses, and exploit them.

Ride a Dragon

Traverse through the overworld of Trinity Of The Fabled on the back of a mighty dragon, featuring unique mounted gameplay in a way never done before. Evolve your mount through experience gain and unlock new abilities through the Abyss.

short_description: DARK FANTASY ACTION RPG. Join Trinity Of The Fabled, a league of Warriors, Gods, and Demons who traverse the Abyss in seek of wealth and power. A new dark fantasy experience with brutal combat, dragon riding, and an evolving world with each season.
